Articles.Content: A mod that adds in remodeled fairing bases? Not like Ven's Stock Revamp or any of those kinds of mods. Like something that adds in remodels, maybe more realistic fairing bases with nice, retextured fairings.

You ask for stock or PF if for PF there are a handful of them like [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/126788-1-0-4-WIP-Procedural-Fairings-For-Everything!-v0-0-3-2015-184](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/126788-1-0-4-WIP-Procedural-Fairings-For-Everything!-v0-0-3-2015-184) and have seen one for the stock but it was just re-texture the fairing not the base also.
I meant for stock fairings. I like them and they have a lot of potential, but to be honest they could use a lot of work.

I'm currently using the Stock Fairing Texture Switcher provided by amazing Thomas P. : [LINK](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128325-ANSWERED-Is-there-any-way-to-make-a-texture-switcher-for-the-stock-fairings?p=2072821&viewfull=1#post2072821)

Fairing base textures are easily changed by the Firespitter Texture Switcher.

Still you'll need to draw some textures for yourself. I duplicated and recolored the stock texture for myself.
